datasets.name: 5d2ed024
queryLines:
SELECT 
    campaign_id,
    campaign_name,
    campaign_description,
    cost,
    start_date,
    end_date,
    MEASURE(`total_sent`),
    MEASURE(`total_delivered`),
    MEASURE(`total_spam`),
    MEASURE(`total_opens`),
    MEASURE(`total_optouts`),
    MEASURE(`total_clicks`),
    MEASURE(`unique_clicks`),
    MEASURE(`ctr`),
    MEASURE(`delivery_rate`)
FROM main.dbdemos_aibi_cme_marketing_campaign.metrics_events 
GROUP BY ALL
ORDER BY MEASURE(`ctr`) desc, cost ASC;

lines: # AIBI DBDemos - Analyse your Email Campaigns!
Databricks makes it easy to build ultra-personalized email campaign leveraging GenAI, and track their effectiveness.
Analysis of contact activity and actions recorded, together with feedbacks and comments collected on the campaign
Databricks makes it easy to build ultra-personalized email campaign leveraging GenAI, and track their effectiveness!

frame.title: campaigns
frame.description: Sorted by CTR and campaign Cost
